弹性布局

flex

参考mzui 链接http://zui.sexy/m/

弹性盒子父元素类

  • .xui-flex {display: flex!important;}
  • .xui-flex-inline {display: inline-flex!important;}
垂直排列 水平排列 方向 flex-direction
  • .xui-flex-row {flex-direction: row;}
  • .xui-flex-column {flex-direction: column;}
  • .xui-row-reverse {flex-direction: row-reverse;}
  • .xui-column-reverse {flex-direction: column-reverse;}
换行 flex-wrap
  • .xui-flex-wrap {flex-wrap: wrap;}
  • .xui-flex-nowrap {flex-wrap: nowrap;}
x轴两端对齐 左对齐 右对齐 居中 justify-content
  • .xui-space-between {justify-content: space-between;}
  • .xui-justify-start {justify-content: flex-start;}
  • .xui-justify-end {justify-content: flex-end;}
  • .xui-justify-center {justify-content: center;}
Y轴 展开 上对齐 下对齐 垂直居中 align-items
  • .xui-stretch {align-items: stretch;}
  • .xui-align-start {align-items: flex-start;}
  • .xui-align-end {align-items: flex-end;}
  • .xui-align-middle {align-items: center;}
水平垂直居中
  • .xui-flex-center {justify-content: center;align-items: center;}
使用弹性盒布局，且内部元素自动调整大小并填充水平空间，
  • .xui-justified { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; > * {flex: auto !important;} > .#{$namespace}flex-none {flex: none!important} }

以下辅助类应用于弹性盒子元素

子元素排列顺序
  • .xui-flex-first {order: -1;}
  • .xui-flex-last {order: 1;}
子元素空间分布
  • .xui-flex-auto {flex: auto;}
  • .xui-flex-none {flex: none;}
子元素 单个垂直排列方式
  • .xui-selft-stretch {align-self: stretch;}
  • .xui-align-self-start {align-self: flex-start;}
  • .xui-align-self-end {align-self: flex-end;}
  • .xui-align-self-middle {align-self: center;}
